title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 533.6 - No discontinuance on saturday, sunday, public holiday, or day on which the main business office of the company is not open for business
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 533.6 - No discontinuance on saturday, sunday, public holiday, or day on which the main business office of the company is not open for business

State Regulations

No waterworks corporation shall discontinue service to any
person for nonpayment of bills or for failure to post a required deposit on a

Saturday, Sunday, public holiday, or day on which the main business office of
the company is not open for business. For purposes of this section, "public
holiday" shall refer to those holidays enumerated in the General Construction

Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
533.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
